author: albertdow
body: This module is able to remove the overlap between PF jets and taus. The PF jets would be taken from a PFJetCollection and the tau objects come from an HLT filter (so that we can use taus that are ID'ed and isolated). This is necessary for the development of VBF jets + tau HLT paths where we need to cross-clean the PF jets from taus.
title: adding a PFJets-Tau overlap removal module for HLT
